Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a unique value proposition that we believe could significantly benefit you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $1800000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the opportunity for you to secure it at a competitive advantage. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this outstanding product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
